conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;Non-pecuniary damage - award
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
